      • log

        public static void log(int level,
                       java.lang.String tag,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        level - int >= 0, only messages with level <= OcrVars.LOG_LEVEL are logged
        tag - tag of the message to log, must be less than 24 chars long
        message - message to log

      • findSubstring

        public static int findSubstring(java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String substring)
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be compared
        substring - The second string to be compared
        Returns:
        the slightest difference between strings and text

      • findSubstring

        public static int findSubstring(java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String substring,
                                java.lang.Integer max)
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be compared
        substring - The second string to be compared
        max - maximum distance accepted
        Returns:
        the slightest difference between strings and text

        Returns:
